website_summaries.verdict: One of the top premium LaCie external hard drives that offers great capacity and portability.
pros: The heavy-duty aluminum construction makes the exterior weather and impact-resistant without bulky padding
Compatible with USB-C and USB 3.0 ports
cons: Use with a Mac computer may require a reformatting of the hard drive

customer_reviews.title: SUPERIOR PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: LaCie is the premium brand of Seagate. It is a very stylish and elegant portable drive that works perfectly. It is one of the very few drives that has a USB-C connector on the drive itself. It works perfectly to perform Time Machine backups on a 2018 MacBook Pro. The unit comes with two cables, USB-C on both ends, and USB-C to USB for compatibility with older devices. Speed of operation is very fast. The LaCie 1TB external drive is Highly Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Product Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this external hard drive
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this a little over a year ago for my new MacBook pro. I've had two main issues. 1. The cord would come loose all the time. If I shifted my computer even a bit, the disk would eject. 2. The disk doesn't work at all now. My computer recognizes that it is there but it won't mount which means everything that is there can't be used. I've troubleshooted everything LaCie has told me to do plus other solutions but none of it is working. The last hard drive I used for my old computer is still working 5 years later. I would not suggest this hard drive to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Ross Shearer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect back-up Drive
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one we have purchased for our home. The first one is on a laptop and is so good and powerful and fast. When we needed a second backup drive, this was an automatic choice. In both cases this serves as our back-up drive and is simple to install and is very fast.
customer_reviews.author: DocTheology

product_meta.title: LaCie Porsche Design 1TB USB-C Mobile Hard Drive, Silver + 2mo Adobe CC Photography (STFD1000400)
product_meta.description: Out of a collaboration born in 2003, a trailblazing Tech firm and an iconic design house have forged another functional showpiece. The LaCie Porsche design mobile drive welds forward-thinking technology from LaCie with immaculate style from Porsche design. It features reversible USB-C connectivity for next-generation computers as well as compatibility with those PC and Mac computers with USB 3.0 ports. To store your past and future memories, the LaCie Porsche design mobile drive also offers the highest capacity drives available. It also delivers speeds of up to 5 GB/S1, so you can drag and drop files and perform backups quickly. With its minimalist, all-aluminum enclosure, this product is lightweight but also feels sturdy and substantial in your hands.
